virality_potential.justification: Contains only URLs with no contextual text or engagement hooks, limiting shareability beyond niche audiences.

informative_value.justification: No verifiable information provided - only unexplained links without context.

sentiment_polarity.justification: No textual content to analyze for emotional tone.

duration_of_impact.justification: Link-only content without context becomes irrelevant immediately after posting.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Extremely optimistic tone using 'inevitable' prediction and moon symbolism.

duration_of_impact.justification: Price predictions remain relevant until target dates or market conditions change.

informative_value.justification: Highlights practical challenges in blockchain interoperability.

informative_value.justification: Pure humor without substantive content about Ethereum.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Mildly negative comparison through humorous mockery.

informative_value.justification: No substantive information about Ethereum's technology or ecosystem.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral humorous comparison without clear positive/negative framing.

duration_of_impact.justification: Joke format tied to current crypto culture trends with limited shelf life.

virality_potential.justification: Time-based humor has moderate shareability within crypto circles.
